notes:
It spawns with the shape of a spider egg [[File:Primal Pack Beast.gif]] and changes into the shape of a [[Noxious Ripptor]] one second later. If it's not killed in 20 seconds it becomes a [[Fungosaurus]] with full health. It's one of the 11 different types of [[Primal Pack Beast]]s.

{{JSpoiler|It's part of the fight against [[The Primal Menace]] during the [[Primal Ordeal Quest]].}}
name: Primal Pack Beast (Noxious Ripptor)
strategy: Kill them fast to avoid having to deal with the much more dangerous Fungosaurus.
